scripts.dev:web: bun run build && cargo run --features web --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml --
scripts.build:web: bun run build && cargo build --release --features web --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml
scripts.install:app: bun run tauri build && mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && ln -sf "$(pwd)/src-tauri/target/release/file-review" ~/.local/bin/file-review && echo '✓ Installed to ~/.local/bin/file-review'
scripts.install:web: bun run build:web && mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && ln -sf "$(pwd)/src-tauri/target/release/file-review" ~/.local/bin/file-review && echo '✓ Installed web-enabled binary to ~/.local/bin/file-review'
